content:
In the coordinate plane below, the $x$-axis represents the number of hours before or after noon.   For example, $-1$ would represent $11 \text{ a.m.}$ The $y$-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The points $(-1, 6)$ and $(7,6)$ represent two temperatures at different times of the day.

**Plot the points on the coordinate plane.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**How many hours pass between the two temperatures shown?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] hours
